name: Control: Override
description:
A short puzzle game where you play as a computer virus overriding the world inside the computer as you please.

You can only "hold" one "Control" at a time. Thus you are constantly out of "Control". But you are not the only thing who can hold them.  And you are not the only thing those controls can affect. 

Credits:

Programming: B-DeshiDev

Level design: B-DeshiDev

Non existent art assets: B-DeshiDev

Music: TheCatPlaysGamez (https://soundcloud.com/thecat-playsgamez)

Made for the GMTK2020  gamejam in one day after a mid jam crisis.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys for gameplay input.

Left mouse button: Hold to aim ray. Release to transfer "Control" at a valid target(ray color will change while aiming at a valid target).

Hold R to reset level when you're stuck (and you will be).
